values:
HOLY SHIT!

its almost my 20th birthday and my last REAL entry in to this thing was rite at my 19th birthday!

how long its been.......

back in the day when i hated this thing at first but becasue of chad and the girl "whos name is not spoken" i got one...got addicted then myspace came along and then I seemed to fall of the face of the planit!


so i guess i'd see whos still on here and see whats been going on?

as for me i'm back in school...back at good ole OU, livein the dorm life and loveing it!

my car finaly broke the 300whp and 300wtq mark...i think theres a dyno pic on my photo thing
http://s36.photobucket.com/albums/e19/06Black/

i still wake up every day and hope i'll get back into contact with the poeple back home becase thats the most important thing...but then i find myself tobusy or pissed cuz i never hear from them to make a solid effert to call them....so i guess i'm kinda stuck.

i think that some how we need to make a b-dubs trip here just for the hell of it...chad,lauren,amanda,tom,both kyles...everybody!.....lol..lauren wow havent said that name in a while...

or at least who ever the fuck can make it!

idk...what do ya'll think?

WOW i dont even know if people use this thing any more but I guess its time for a long over due update and i'll see who says what.

first off i'll give ya'll some updated pics of the only thing i care about.
[IMG]http://i36.photobucket.com/albums/e19/06Black/cobaltmeet.jpg[/IMG]

dont know if that'll work but theres a link to it none the less

Life's alrite ya know what i mean, same old, same old.

work is a pain...no free time on weekends but the money is good.

i guess thats it...my overall mood hasent changed much if at all sence i left this place...some people you miss forever some you forget the next day.

ok so today was my birthday......well yesterday technically but what eve it was a great day i heard from everybody even TOM! and i saw a few at least the ones that are important and had time....i didn't get to see every body tho cuz they were busy doing other things, so shit happens i guess but none the less it was an amazing and fun day i even got to go see a amazing funny movie "waiting" and shit yea its even got dane cook in it! and Tara T went with me which was all i wanted for my birthday cuz shes just that darn cool. but the big thing that i'm supper happy about is the recent start of the NHL hockey season ROCK ON RED WINGS! they kicked STL's ass 5 to 2! and that was made even better cuz i got to watch it with the sawsomeist, funnest, cutest girl like ever!(youknowwhoyouare) so yea besides school kicking my ass all things have been good. so thanks for every things friends your the best. love ya all!

not to long ago i turned down hanging out with my old trusty friends i traded them for a collige a party wich at the time sounded cool but a day or two later a kid who is like family to me confrunted me about it and only them did i realize that i did in fact "hoe" them out and i've felt kinda shity about it for the past few days mainly because things dont seem to be the same between me and him and thats not cool. but i can tell you all one thing...never leave your true friends for any party or any other people its not worth it. so i ask that you can let me slide on this one and i hope things get back to the way they were. what do you say?

Yes its almost 5am and yes i have been up all night you may ask your self why well its a very simple answer its a class that is simply called "calc" and i have a quiz in about 4 hours or so. So this is my first all nighter of collige and its not all i exspected it to be but ohhh fuckin well.....the main reason i'm writeing this is cuz i think i'm bout to give up on the "long" hair idea that i started a bit ago....its just so fuckin annoying rite now plus it hasent realy had many or any good reasons to have it but idk also i've been thinkin bout not shavin and growin some facial hair or somethin idk i whant to change somethin ya kno why not? drop your comment's or thoughts on that we will just go from here....fucked if i kno man. 
One more random thing i was readin my like first cupple lj entries and wow how things have changed from no more b-dubs to people movin away(loveyatom)and we all seemed so dam happy god what a great time seniour year was and chad one thing i gotta say is"we rule" god that was an awesome comment.....one mroe thing its a bit of advise my soseoligy prof said on monday when we were havin a tlak about "people and there nature" he said ask your friends a few questions so here they are
1)if i needed would you give me a place to stay
2)if i came to you asking for help how far would you go
3)what if one day i changed what would you do or say
4)what would you do if i did something totaly unexspected
5)if you could ask me JUST one queiston what would it be.

Thats it and thats all mane

COLLIGE LIFE! god dam if i knew i was gonna like it this much i would have tryed to skip high school! i love it goin to class from 10:40 to 3:30 2 days a week and from 2 to 5 1 day a week its great my dorm rocks and my roomate is awesome and i just love it...no hours or rules and you can have anybody come and stay for a cupple days its awesome! word to the wise tho dont skip a class(guilty) cuz the one you skip is the one that the prof says somethin important.
before i go and put something in this does anybody still read these or what? dont tell me "myspace" is the new thing to do

well what an amazeing CP05 greatist trip yet adn the best bunch of guys ever teh cobalt and the cavey halled ass with a few memerable side tracks and because we seemed to never stop so that makes things just that much dam cooler! so lets start from the begining Ok first of the car ride was the 2nd greatist thing ever...ohio will now be named "Land of 1000 weird smells"also with out CP ohio would not be a state it ahs no other resason to not be the next air force bomb range i mean even the hot girls are fuckin ulgy totaly like "20 fotters" if you get what i mean and the breakfast stop lead to the best convo ever" mom 2 can i go to the bather room?" "I told you to call me DAD"...just for everybody else that was said by a kid about 7 years old who looked scared out of his mind...than the park WOW bitchen rides and like 1 hot girl than the car ride back was sweet just because chad and i learned to rap a song and the fireworks are the fuckin shit even tho we did bring them home aobut 2in from the car battery but ohh fricken well...so all and all what an amzeing trip and what a sweet grup of dudes...you all rock guys lets never forget it and look forward to CP06!

fuck en A man what a fun summer its been so far.
i got a new car and its tight as shit...i'm in love!
i've been workin and drinkin as much as can cuz thats all i seem to have time to do
chillin with the same people as always and i could not ask for more
life's grand so i cant bitch to much but i needed to updadte cuz i havent in a long ass time
when my lazy ass dad gets a digital camera i'll post pics of the car and me with the car cuz i'm sweet! 
now its not as hot as amanda J's are but i have a cooler car and thats all that matters...SO HA
if you think this is lame than get over it and leave me somethin any way....if you think its cool well than your rite so tell me how much you like being rite..K...good,great,get it,got it, GOOD DAMIT!
and I'm OUT!
in the words of sam adams"DRINK MY BEER DAMIT! IT'LL GET YOU DRUNK!"




dam i'm good

well same old shit goin on see a cuple good movies been around some dank cool people and had a few good experiences so summer has been the shit so far! so yea i'm dam tired but i dont wanna sleep...so hows your summer been?



p.s.The home depot is the devil!

OK so how many of you have ever wanted something so dam bad that you can taste it, you can smell it, you can just see your self with it or around it or what ever? i'm not just talking objects eather this applys to people to. your best friend or maybe your significant other or maybe your car or just something? well shit i've got that real bad rite now...i've got to make a choise i can get a fully loaded out 05 GTP with tap-shit and the heads up display and leather and EVERY THING! for a little chepper than the SRT-4 that i want and i have no idea what to do? and than thers the other side of this issue women...your dam confuseing but thank god i've got some cool ones around to chill with...from hearing the jill jokes at sara's pistons party to wanting to beat the shit out of the kid whole stole my seat at the same place. its been crazy round here...lots of work and lots of waching andy and tom play the same dam comp game togather every day but the game does look cool so i give it props and for the first time in a long ass time i get to chill with lauren that was cool even tho she kicked my ass in mario cart 64 but what eve there will be a rematch! so yea i just wish i could make up my mind and have a few things go my way cuz so far this has been the summer of my LIFE just like i had been hopeing for...and for all the guys out there dudes we gotta pick at date for CP 05! guys only for the first trip tho...women later...last year was sweet this year is gonna be even better i've got all kinds of saying and weird shit to talk about! so yea lets get crackin!

Ok so now with all the stress of graduating and partys done i can finaly sit back and look back at these past 3 crazy weeks and just how much shit happend in them from relitives flying in and never seeing them to working 40 hours a week to fighting my parents for this dam car. i hope everybody had fun at my graduation party and i thank all of you for comeing i'll be at as many others as i can. so schools finaly done ehh? gosh it doesnt feel like it from all the letters from differnt colliges to oreantations(its 1am and you think i can spell HA) to all that shit i'm geting sick of it and all i want to do is let lose i just want to go out and party not hard core just some friends and fun just like i have been hopeing for all year but things owuld be much sweeter if i could just get this dam car i've never worked so hard for something before in my life and i'm SO clsoe to geting it tha i can taste the burnt rubber. i hate my dad if it wasent for him i would ahve it by now but hes gotta be an ass and fight me for it but i will win i always win! so yea i hope people are doing good and haveing fun and enjoying summer and if your haveing problums i wish you the best of luck and i hope things work out but if they dont you can all call me to talk...shit its what i do best. so yea party on people and enjoy every day. now its time for you all to help me if the STi doesnt work out what else is out there worth geting i've looked at the new gto but it blows in snow i was thinkin about an ion redline or a cobalt SS or maybe just a WRX but if you ahve any good ideas let me know. thanks and peace and love i'll be seeing you all soon.

COME TO MY GRADUATION PARTY THIS SUNDAY....ITS START AT THE VFW HALL AT LIKE 2 OR 3 THAN AROUND 7 OR 8  ALL THE FRIENDS CAN COME BACK TO MY HOUSE....EVERYBODY IS INVITED SO COME AND FUCKIN PARTY! I WNAT AS MANY PEOPLE TO COME AS POSSIBLE! CALL ME FOR MORE INFO!

Alrite so alot has happend sence i last updadted. we finished school and we had prom and tomorrow i walk in my final school related thing ever! and its a bit scarry every thing i've known for the past few years is done and over with and i have to start new but its a chance to take what i've learned over my last 18 years and hopefully do good in collige and hopefully get a baller job.

Rite now i'm more wirried about saying good bye to all the people i have to and geting this car strightend out cuz i'll kill my slef i dont get it soooooo you can tell how much it means to me. but over these past few days many great things have happend like prom MY GOD! how amazeing was that i had a blast and i had the perfect dadte...jill thanks soooo much you were amazeing.
I dont care what people did for prom cuz i had more fun just my and chad and amanda and jill rollin to prom in the magnum and enjoying every dam sec of it thanks to everybody who was there you all made it an amazeing night! and the after party was amazeing even tho i drank WAY to much and made an ass out of my self a few times it was well fuckin worth it cuz the next day my head hurt and i loved it. 

Than i had a great trip to DQ with lauren who i missed so dam much that it turned into the best DQ trip ever lauren i fuckin love our little trips your jsut so incredable! so class of 05 we finaly fuckin made it and its done now lets party,lets drink,lets enjoy the summer of our LIVES!

hot dam friends we did it! and GO PISTONS!
alrite i'm leave this one here till i got more than like 10 fuckin people this is crazy folks.....just leave me somethin i'll check it once in a while

ok so work's still a bitch...but i love it my first pay check was $500+. its finaly nice out side so thank fuckin god for that...and yes chad i did cut my hair BUT it was for a very good reason....my dad told me this last night "you want that new car?" i said hell yea and he said "well get a hair cut before graduation" so i got it cut today so by the time we graduate it'll be longer...its the best i could do. so on to the more important topic...WHOS HAVEING GRADUATION PARTYS AND WHAT DATE???MINE IS ON THE 5TH OF JUNE YOUR ALL INVITED SO YOU BETTER FUCKIN BE THERE ITS GONNA BE SWEEEEEET!

work is KILLING ME! my very first week i worked over 37 hours and just this weekend i worked till 11:30friday...missed the LO prom party becasue i was called in at 5:45AM to help with shit...and i just got off at 7...i love the hours and i love the CASH!!!!! even more....but dam thats alot of work and most of it's pretty dam hard...but its paying for the suby so its worth it....just gotta amke to june...chad and eddie i love the voice mail i got from you 2...thanks for that it was great....well hope every one is havin a good weekend...

not much to talk about...the prom tics look sweet this year.
i hope it worms up SOON
and workin at the home depot is kinda fun cool people and good moeny i kinda like it.
just leave me some thin folks...just any thing lets see what happens

"If i could walk on water and i could find some way to prove it would you beleve it...that my love is so true...worse things have been done by better men".

(from the same song)"now i'm no angel now i'll admit i've made a few bad moves that i'll soon regret"

(also from the same song)Worse things have been done by better men".

"TAKE ME HOME TONIGHT! I dont want to let you go to  see the light.....i just want to hear you say be my little baby"

"WHAT IS LOVE...ohh baby dont hurt me....dont hurt me NO MORE"

"never made it as a wise man....couldent cut it as a poor man stealin...tired of livein like a blind man..i'm sick of my lack of the sence of feelin...and this is how you remind me of what I REALY AM"

" when the lights go down in the city and the sun shines on the bay.....ohhh i wanna be there in my city."

"I think i'll just have my slef a beer"

"I want you and your beutifull soal"

"what it is ho....a whaaats up?"

"every thing is so blurry and everyone is FAKE!"......"my whole world surounds you"

"ROCK YOU LIKE A HURICANE"

"THIS FOR ALL MY PLAYAS OUT THERE riden spiners....i dont care where you at all i want you to do is STOP and let'em keep spinin"

"theres a place off ocean aveune"

"day after day i'm more confused...yet i look for the light"

"you dont know ME!"

some song lyrics of the cd i have rite now...all of them have something to do with life in some way or another...its kinda crazy if you lision for it...most songs have alot of down to earth point.

amanda look back at my last post i wrote back to you.

I fuckin hate this cold weather...soccer games are cool even if your cold....the back seat of a saturen is real small and crazy weird....insurance is a BITCH!.....i finaly start at THD tomorrow...(THD=the home depot)...kinda excited....THD+lots of hours=STi its SIMPLE!

ok so here comes on of the bigist dance's of our high school lives and just like all of them in the past i stand alone thinking about it....do i go or not?....well i'm not going....at least not alone agen and i'm fine with that because i do have just one shineing glimer of hope in comeing time because....i've moved on from geting that truck because i was i shown the path of greatnees and it simply said "STI" now how many of you kno that is i realy dont care because there are people among us that do kno...and yea black and bronze rims or black and silver? or maybe not black at all....so yea thats my life...hockey rules! people suck and i hope bob's ok with this car because i'm geting it no matter what...look for it a few days after graduation. and yea this is lame cuz its 11 on a friday and i'm at home WOW...i guess when u say that your gonna call some one back....and than you do it means that they dont have to pick up. this is me tired and not careing


                                         THE FUCKING END

WOW....thats just about all i wanna say about this weekend. it wasnothing REALY great but it was alot of fun. from 7 days stright goin on 8 of playin hockey at the park toandy and I drivein around friday night with nothin todo to saturday night with a fuckin crazy fun party as "jeska's" house where i'm proud to say that were friends now...we have known of each other for a little while but never realy talked or any thing but this fixed all that. and the sweet pic i have with jeska and tara and to lision to stef talk to her self in her passed out sleep and wachin tyler run around in some REAL tight girl pants makin an ass of him slef and just siten back talkin to stef and shootin the shit with ross and LB and lil jessy was there and she was good fun havin around. it was sweet times ask for more storys...than sunday kinda sucked playind hockey agen for a while than i went home chilled than went out for a night time drive around with the windows down it was great. best weekend in a while i  cant fuckin waite for summer! and chad dude we gotta get u a phone man i had a msg from you but no number to call you back on.
i love all my saturday night crew!


"pimp till i die playa till they barry me...true renigade"

in light of how depresed that last entry sounded. it wasent ment to be.... so i think its a good time to updadte....but i also decided that it was time to make this a friends only LJ...just cuz i wanna..so you know the drill 

                                          COMMENT TO BE ADDED!

ASK WHY..........................................
why do we think so many things but never do them?
why do we care so much about what other people think of us?
why do we care so much about how we look comparied to everybody else?
why do we wish so many thing but never go after them?
why are some blessed with everything when others can only wish?
why does it always seem like we never have enought or were not good enough?
why does it matter who we know and who we are connected with?
and the bigist thing...
why does it seem like I always want and wish for the things that i can never have...but i'm never happy with what I've got?
am i the only one who feels these things?




to all my friends i just whant to say thank you...just for every thing, for all the times i've rambled on about pointless shit you were always willing to sit there and lision.also for the times that i've gone on about a girl for days...only to come back a day later and bitch and mone about how it dident work out just like every thing else...i just owe u all a huge thank you...and chad mainly you bro...hope things work out with every thing u ever want..and i cant waite to ride with you with the windows down in the ion.

Thanks friends...you are the best a guy like me could ever ask for

to all the hot girls i've ever been friends with..you kno who you are cuz i've prob told u at least 3 times....i thank you to...for makeing these pointless school days worth comeing to...if for nothing more than a simple hello,a hug, and a smile..

If i was to ask you what u think the one thing i want is.....what would you say?
p.s. I'm leaving this here untill i get alot of comments or till something REAL cool happens cuz i'm tired of updating all the time for like 15 comments cuz thats just lame

god dam....SON of a bitch! what a great night. i love all thouse kids.
my wing man chad and AMANDA!
and than my 1 in a million lauren!
and jill was there but she was with un-cool kids cuz they dident talk to me or chad so there lame but jills still cool even if she left EARLY!
but now i'm kinda sick and it sucks. i hate cold weather FUCK THIS SHIT!

finaly outta shit to talk about....its b-dubs agen...but other than that its just a lmae ass week....i hate school i dont kno why i care as much about it as i do....fuck this place i'm outta here as soon as i can...i just wanna go back up north....i'm happy to dinaly be done...but i'm going to miss it

alrite i think i may be on the OLDIST COMPUTER EVER! but i'm at my hotel and its like 12:30am so u cn tell i'm bord as shit. i've drank like 4 red buls in the last 2 hours so i kno i wont be sleeping much but thats cool with me cuz today has been pretty tight. i had a solid day of raceing go dont kinda early and than i've just been chillen out in the hotel all day wich has been GREAT! i slep for like 2.5 hours and than wached a movie and than played some GT4 so its been great! than i got an awesome call from the magster! that made my night it was just good fun talking to somebody back home that had nothing better to do than me just to chill and talk BUT to get signal in my room i had to stand at the window and sence theres a main road about 30ft away from my window all the cars could see me standing there and talking at the window but than my arm got kinda tired so i taped my phone to the window(GO ME for that sweet idea) than i talked for a bit longer than i had to rushto get ready cuz i was going out to dinner with my aunt wich was good fun we just sat around in a bar eating bar buggers and tlaking about all kinda shit it was nice to kick back with some family that i havent seen in a while but than i can back and it was like 11:45 or 12:00 so i started packing up my room and than after that i jumped on this old ass computer. so thats my day and to TK whom i tryed 3 times to call but eather dident have signal or got a busy tone i'm verry upset that we dident get to talk cuz i was looking forward to hearing your voice and of corse talking about the other night with that sweet bord game of yours...TOMS A PARRTY POOPER!(he said it on the phone) and chad whos ass was like half asleep when i called at like mid-night what the shit people dont u all do shit when i'm not around? but on a much lighter note i have gotten some sweet looks from hill-billys up here cuz after all my car flashs blue and is loud as fuck so its been a great trip! but i am happy that from now on that i will be able to be a normal kid and sleep in and party on the weekends but this has been arace/weekend to remember cuz theres not many people so the race goes fast and all the kids that are here are cool and cuz its not that cold and becasue of a few others things...its just been fun but i'm looking forward to my drive home tomorrow cuz than i can put up the ski's and finaly call it quits.to me thats a sad thing but in all truth all good things must come to an end so why not end things on a hell of a sweet note? any way peace and love folks i'll be seeing ya'll in like18 hours or so

with the season FINALY over i now have the time to do all the quality kid stuff like homework and that FUN STUFF!..but i'm glad its over iget my life back and no more puting up with all the guys shit. but than agen i'm going to miss the few but great times i've had over the last few years. but i'm glad to be done so i can start makeing cash agen! the last 4 years have been many things...hard work,late nights but also great times. to all the kids who i've had the pleaser to ski with i will never forget any of you. but there is one last race that i HAVE to go to but than its over i'll put up the skis and boots all untill the next time if there is a next time. i will miss it next year.

With the ski season so close to being over i dont kno what the hell i'm gonna do...theres OAA's today and states on monday thats it for high school...than one more cussa race that i'm going to just to see 1 person because nobody has made such a huge impact on me in such a short time as she did(pics from the race soon)
i just dont kno...i cant handle a full week of school its just to hard any more...all the teachers and parents are on my ass just cuz i'm a seniour and thats bull shit! but i just wanna party any more...if i cant do the one thing that i'm good at (skiing) than what the hell am i gonna do?...and to the b-dubs crew i'm disopointed about last night there just wasent enough people...chad arnt u happy i took your ass out there..amanda u missed the fuck out girl!..and arron and katie good luck u 2 love birds but arron its not polite to point ;) but yea i'm done for now i have so much to think about and i just dont whant to worry about fucking school anymore...is that a bad thing? and last thing here...to my cuz if she ever reads this i must say that last night was a blast just talking about old times...and chad thanks for putting up with that man..i lvoe u cal i forgot how much fun we used to have!

alrite....i'm going on 5 hours of sleep and i just got home from a 9 hour ski race...i dont kno if i have ever been this tired but its ok cuz i'm almost done with my Hw and its B-DUBS NIGHT BITCHS! dam i cant waite!
but than back to fucking school tomorrow i hate it! i dont kno what i'm going to do when the season is over i'm going to have SOOO much free time i'm going to be SO bord but hey maybe something new will happen and shit might change ya never kno...b-dubs ya'll lets make it happen!(chad your going to go nig!)
can somebody please tell me how the shit i can put pics in my LJ cuz i have to show the world one of the coolist girls EVER!

alrite a few flipen incredable.....spring break is alot closer than i thought and i have NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO idea waht the fuck if anything i'm going to do over it....i odnt wanna just chill around this boreing ass town but i might have to......so if u have any ideas or segjustions PLEASE TELL ME!........2nd i'm so close to being down with skiing I cant waite to have some free time to chill with the friends...3rd and final i may bitch about haveing to ski SOO much but dam i just kno i'm gonna miss all the sweet kids from the races i kno i wont see many of them ever agen!

copyed from lauren.....so lets see what happens with this


ask Any five questions.

No matter how personal, private, or random.

I have to answer them honestly.
I have to answer them all.

In turn, you post this message in your own journal;

& you have to answer the questions that are asked to you.

alrite ya'll you prob kno what i gotta this weekend....i'm headed up to marquette for the last mid-a of the year so call me and wish me luck or leave me a sweet comment....but yea long car rides are my life now..well that and b-dubs but its all good...the season is almost done here...and yea if anybody wants to be a true friend come out to me meet on monday at PK and cheer me/the team on...nobdoy has ever came to any of these...so it would be real cool just dress worm! but thats it for me i hope you all have a good weekend and i'll see ya'll monday or tuesday what ever is the first day back in school for me...
and chad thanks for a lil bit of info last night...i dident have a clue!...i miss homeandher alredy!
peace and love my nigga's! and yea i kinda live these lil questions things i come acroos and think of some times so heres a few

1)what would u do if i moved to a diff state.(its closer to happening than u think)

2)what would u do if i held your hand

3)if i kissed you?

4)got in a  bad accident

5)asked u to just trust me on something

6)if u called my name and i just kept walking

7)crashed me car

8)stoped being LOUD!

9) wasent funny any more

10)could actuly spell!

this last one if for the LADIES!!!! and well the guys if they realy wanna say something
11)If idident give the best hugs ever

12)stoped trying to mkae u smile and happy

COMMENT IT UP!!! i jsut gotta kno!..shit i'll be gone till like monday or tuesday thats plenty of time!

ever gone back and looked at old your old LJ or even your friends old LJ well i just did and its weird cuz u can remeber how u felt when you wrote things and just how differnt things are from them...i even went back in to this one old LJ..this person has a new LJ but i went back to there old one...and looked back too like october and i found something i never want to forget so thats what this is about...just take a sec and look back at your and your friends and see what you find...PEACE!
B DUBS BOYS!
and for the few girls its BDUBS TIME!
and umm lauren where the hell were u today?...b-dubs tonight?

alrite i got home this morning at like 2:30am and than i unpacked the car and all that and i feel asleep in my shoes and socks and all that stuff so that sucked to wake up in but at least i was in my own bed. but i couldent get my mind of this 1 things over my trip but it did make my happy a few times and than i had this totaly epic sweet DREAM you ever have thouse? the ones u think is real the ones u wake and up from and your like "dam i dident wanna wake up!" well yea i had one of thouse and the lucky few well hear about it. but for some uncany reason i dont dream much but when i do they have all came true in ony way or another and my god i wish this one comes true. its nothing GREAT but it would just make me the happyist fucking kid ever! but what eve! lest just say i'm not going to quit on something i gave up a while ago so yea this wont make much sense to people but i'm just so pumped about it that i had to write it down so HERE read this i hope u like it and tell me if u ever had a dream like this!
